content: the larksfoot blanket - the newest addition to the yarn stash series by hannah cross this blanket really is a classic that anyone can tackle all you need is a bunch of your favourite coloured yarns - as many or a few as you like - and you re away using a simple repeat this is the perfect beginner project to practise your technique and gauge the pattern includes suggested colour combination step by step photo tutorial written pattern in both uk and us terms stitch key conversion chart and hanjan voucher
